sentences.en: A slogan is over the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 一条标语在黑板正上方.

sentences.en: Although Microsoft's slogan Where do you want to go today?

sentences.cn: 高喊政治口号的示威者

sentences.en: Enterprise slogan: Wisdom creates value; Quality accomplishes dreams!
sentences.cn: 企业宗旨: 智慧创造价值, 品质成就梦想!

sentences.en: It is a horribly defeatist slogan.
sentences.cn: 姑且称之为骇人听闻的保卫标语.

sentences.en: Mr Jones: A good slogan is very important.
sentences.cn: 琼斯先生: 一句恰当的标语实在很重要.

sentences.en: Pumping hot air with splendid slogan really doesn't help in this case.
sentences.cn: 制造紧张空气,打出冠冕堂皇的标语并不能改变什么.

sentences.en: Slogan, appears more clearly in the rain.

sentences.cn: 这个好. 就用它作标语吧.

sentences.en: The slogan is a pun on the name of the product.
sentences.cn: 那广告用语与其产品名称一语双关。

sentences.en: The slogan was a pun on the name of the product.
sentences.cn: 那广告用语与其产品名称一语双关.

sentences.en: The slogan was designd to arouse the people.
sentences.cn: 该标语是为唤醒国民而拟定的.

sentences.en: The students chanted the same slogan over and over again.
sentences.cn: 学生们一遍一遍地吟咏着一样的标语.

sentences.en: The urgent need community front propagates layout content or the slogan. High marks!
sentences.cn: 急需社区统战宣传版面内容或标语. 高分!

sentences.en: Which well - known saying, advertising verbals or slogan do have about traffic safety?
sentences.cn: 关于交通安全有哪些名言, 广告词或标语?

words.tran_cn: 使用标语口号；大量使用标语

trans.tran_cn: 标语，口号，呐喊声，（商业广告上用的）短语
trans.tran_en: a short phrase that is easy to remember and is used in advertisements, or by politicians, organizations etc
